clinical_study.brief_title: Childhood Obesity Treatment - Telephone Coaching vc Usual Care
clinical_study.official_title: Exclusive Telephone Coaching in Maintaining Weight Loss - An Randomized Controlled Trial of Childhood Obesity Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates if usual physical care visits to an outpatient pediatric clinic can be replaced with more frequent and shorter Telephone coaching Contacts during 18 months.

detailed_description.textblock: In this randomized controlled study, patients at age 5 to 14 and enrolled in obesity treatment, were randomized to either usual care according to regular routine or to telephone consultation.The randomization was done at the start of individual treatment and lasted for 18 months. We also studied working time required for the Health care, and the families' experience of the Telephone coaching.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in BMI Standard Deviation Score (units)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment, during intervention and follow-up. In total mean 3,7 years
primary_outcome.description: BMI Standard Deviation Score units using the Swedish reference by Karlberg et al 2001.

secondary_outcome.measure: Working time required for the Health care personnel
secondary_outcome.description: Mean time for each group measured in minutes
Experience for both the Telephone consultation and usual care by not validated anonymous questionnaires constructed by the researchers in this project

arm_group.description: Usual care according to regular treatment routines at the clinic during 18 months. The Child and parent(s) at regular visits to the nurse at the clinic.
Intervention: Telephone consultation each months except for summer holidays during 18 months. The treating nurse communicated with one of the parents.

intervention.description: Randomized controlled study of two types of delivering behavioral treatment to Children suffering from obesity.
Randomized controlled study of two types of delivering behavioral treatment to Children suffering from obesity.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children 5 to 14 years old who were patients at the outpatient pediatric centre
- All families after that the parents had attended at least 4 of 7 meetings in a parental/education group.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Obesity related syndromes
- Non-Swedish speaking families
